projects.name: Brain Tumor Segmentation using Unet
notes: Used U-net as the main model for segmenting brain tumor images. Then used the true mask to penalize and train the model accordingly.
Dealt with class imbalance by using different loss functions like weighted cross entropy and dice loss
Trained the model efficiently to 55 epochs without overfitting it and gained a decent dice coefficient as well as sensitivity and specificity
Used dice coefficient, sensitivity, loss, specificity as the main metrics to evaluate the model

projects.name: Country Finder Web App
notes: Made use of an external api called restcountries.eu to pull in data about different countries.
Implemented a simple search function to find different countries and display them.
Applied React states in order to manage the search filtering.
Put a show function to fruition which when clicked would show the country.

projects.name: Multi Class Logistic Regressor
notes: Used gradient descent as an optimization algorithm to find parameters which gets the lowest cost
Used regularization in the cost function to mitigate the risks of overfitting
Using the concept of one vs all, created multiple logistic regressors in one multi-class Regressor and used the prediction which was the most confident
